original_text: As I was in the days of my youth, when the secret of God was upon my tabernacle;
korean_text: 내가 원기 왕성하던 날과 같이 지내기를 원하노라 그 때에는 하나님이 내 장막에 기름을 발라 주셨도다

sentences.original_text: As I was in the days of my youth
when the secret of God was upon my tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 비밀이 내 장막에 있을 때에
